resources.string: … to Yanndroid, who did not stopped to explain the things to me even if I did not understand much and who always helped me, when I had a problem.
You want to contact me or you found an issue?
... to BlackMesa, who helped me to optimize this app.
If you found an issue, you can write it on GitHub in \"Issues\" or privately on Telegram.\nIf you want to send me a quote, you can do it on Telegram.
